name: The Adventure of Fire Elemental
description:
For playing online please play in fullscreen.

This is a Ludum Dare 41 game created in 48 hours by a team of 3 students. It is about a fire elemental that fell into a water with dangerous fish. Your task is to find your way out before being eaten.

Controls:

  • Mouse - for moving along the menu
  • Right/Up/Down - for playing with the character

Please note: There is no way to go Left because of the strong stream of water.

Post-LD: Created restart and other buttons and fast forward button during the game
